headline: Horford had a monster game Monday against the Warriors, dropping in 23 points (10-20 FG, 2-2 FT, 1-4 3Pt), grabbing 16 rebounds and adding six assists, five blocks and three steals in 39 minutes.
Schroder had another impactful game off the bench Monday against the Warriors, scoring 18 points (8-15 FG, 2-5 3Pt) to go along with six assists and three rebounds in just 18 minutes.

Teague, who suffered a right wrist injury in the third quarter of Saturday's double-overtime loss to the Bucks, has been cleared to play Monday against the Warriors, Chris Vivlamore of the Atlanta Journal-Constitution reports.
Bazemore was held to two points (1-5 FG, 0-4 3Pt), five rebounds, two assists and two steals in 26 minutes on Saturday in a loss to the Bucks.
Millsap had 27 points (10-24 FG, 2-7 3Pt, 5-8 FT), 11 rebounds, six assists, two blocks and a steal in 46 minutes on Saturday in a loss to the Bucks.

Hinrich will be available for Saturday's game against the Bucks, the Atlanta Journal Constitution's Chris Vivlamore reports.
Teague totaled 23 points (9-14 FG, 3-7 3Pt, 2-2 FT), seven assists, two rebounds, and one steal in 29 minutes during the Hawks' 115-111 loss to the Heat on Friday.
Hinrich will not play in Friday's game against the Heat, Chris Vivlamore of the Atlanta Journal-Constitution reports.
Hinrich has been traded to the Hawks in exchange for a second-round draft pick, Brian Windhorst of ESPN.com reports.
Splitter (hip) will undergo season-ending surgery on Feb. 25, Chris Vivlamore of the Atlanta Journal-Constitution reports. He's expected to require eight months of recovery time.
Splitter has elected to undergo season-ending surgery on his right hip, Chris Vivlamore of the Atlanta Journal-Constitution reports.
Tavares was recalled from the D-League on Friday, Chris Vivlamore of the AJC reports.

Muscala is averaging 6.2 points, 3.2 rebounds, 1.3 assists, and .5 blocks over 15.3 minutes in February.
